answerText: Christine de Pizan[10] Jean de Meun completed a poem begun by Guillaume de Lorris named after this type of flower. In Romeo and Juliet, Juliet says that this flower "by any other name would smell as sweet."
heading: Michigan Fall Tournament |2013 | Editors Round 11 | 6 | Literature | European | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: The Bow and the Lyre [or El arco y la lira] [10] Name this medieval French poet who also responded to Jean de Meun's misogyny in her most famous work, The Book of the City of Ladies.
